analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x18911e747108241e4afe4feeecc742e90c5177bd.sol:
	Contract VistaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x18911e747108241e4afe4feeecc742e90c5177bd.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x18911e747108241e4afe4feeecc742e90c5177bd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/13/0x18911e747108241e4afe4feeecc742e90c5177bd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x18911e747108241e4afe4feeecc742e90c5177bd.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
